titleStmt.title: A Worthy example of a vertuous wife, who fed her father with her own milk, being condemned to be starved to death, and afterwards pardoned by the emperour. The tune is Flying fame.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and William Gilbertson.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
